professionalSummary: Solving complex technical challenges, developing efficient software solutions, and collaborating in Agile teams to deliver high-quality applications.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Contributed to the evolution of embedded software for helicopters by adding features, fixing bugs, and optimizing performance under security constraints. Implemented CI/CD with Jenkins and integrated SonarQube for rigorous quality control.

experiences.title: Fullstack Developer
experiences.description: Developed a desktop application for mission tracking with an interactive calendar. Used Vue.js and TypeScript for the frontend, connected to a Java API and a MySQL database for efficient data management.

experiences.title: Fullstack Developer
experiences.description: Redesigned a UI in Vue.js and developed an API in Java, focusing on improving user interface and performance.

experiences.title: Rust Developer
experiences.description: Developed a fault diagnosis algorithm in Rust, prioritizing security and portability through native functions.

experiences.title: Python Developer
experiences.description: Developed and improved modules for the ArbreAnalyst software in collaboration with engineers, optimizing functionalities.

experiences.title: Developer (Intern)
experiences.description: Developed a ticketing tool, discovered Python, Docker, and ElasticSearch, and implemented initial automation processes.

projects.title: Wine Cellar Inventory Management App
projects.description: Wine cellar management application developed with Vue.js for the front-end and Rust for the back-end, allowing efficient wine collection tracking and showcasing my full-stack development and API design skills.
